author: @ZoomTv
title: RJ Mahvash, who is rumored to be dating Yuzvendra Chahal, has written a heartfelt birthday message as the cricketer celebrates his 35th birthday, along with sharing a previously unseen photograph. | Zoom TV
text:
RJ Mahvash, rumored to be Yuzvendra Chahal's girlfriend, expresses her affection with a heartfelt birthday message as the cricketer celebrates his 35th birthday, accompanied by a previously unseen photo.
Cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and RJ Mahvash are at the center of dating speculation, although neither has officially acknowledged it. Recently, Mahvash marked Chahal's 35th birthday on Instagram by posting an adorable picture of him along with a charming caption.
platform desk
```htmlSocial media is filled with speculation regarding cricketer
Yuzvendra ChahalandRJ Mahvashbeing in a relationship. Although the pair has not publicly commented on the rumors, fans continue to support their potential romance.Yuzvendracelebrated their 35th birthday on July 23, and to mark the occasion,Mahvashtook to Instagram to post a never-before-seen image ofChahalalong with a heartfelt birthday message for the cricketer. Continue reading for further details!Details on RJ Mahvash's Birthday Tribute to Rumored Partner Yuzvendra Chahal
On social media, Mahvash shared a new image of Chahal, who is captured sitting on a chair at a restaurant, casually posing for the camera. She wrote in the caption, "Happy birthday Yuzi! Aging is a natural part of life, and some aspects can be even tougher! Wishing you all the best." Check out the post here: For those who may not know, Chahal was previously married to Dhanashree Verma. However, they are now officially divorced. Their divorce proceedings were concluded on March 20. Chahal's lawyer Nitin Kumar Gupta confirmed to ANI, "The court has issued the divorce decree. The court has accepted the joint petition from both parties. They are no longer husband and wife." Chahal was seen outside the courthouse wearing a humorous T-shirt that stated, "Be your own sugar daddy," while Dhanashree chose a relaxed outfit consisting of a white T-shirt and blue jeans.
As for Mahvash, she was last featured in Amazon MX Player’s Pyar, Paisa, Profit. In a conversation with Zoom, she discussed her approach to dealing with online trolling, stating, "It doesn’t bother me. I don’t allow it to affect me. I just restrict them. I don’t even block them because they’ll just return with another ID. I restrict them so I can still view their comments and choose whether to approve or disapprove. This way, I don’t have to open the comments, and I don’t lose any followers. So, I restrict."
(Translation: It doesn’t bother me. I don’t allow it to affect me. I just restrict them. I don’t even block them because they’ll just return with another ID. I restrict them so I can still view their comments and choose whether to approve or disapprove. This way, I don’t have to open the comments, and I don’t lose any followers. So, I restrict.)
Stay tuned for more updates!
```
End of Article
